sn46.41:1.2: “Mendicants, all the ascetics and brahmins in the past who have given up the three discriminations have done so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.
sn46.41:1.3: All the ascetics and brahmins in the future who will give up the three discriminations will do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.
sn46.41:1.4: All the ascetics and brahmins in the present who are giving up the three discriminations do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.
sn46.41:1.6: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.41:1.7: All the ascetics and brahmins in the past …
sn46.41:1.9: and present who give up the three discriminations do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.”
